titles.title: To revise the composition of the Board of Zoning Adjustment for the District of Columbia so that the Board will consist solely of members appointed by the government of the District of Columbia, except when the Board is performing functions regarding an application by a foreign mission with respect to a chancery.
District of Columbia Board of Zoning Adjustment Home Rule Act
District of Columbia Board of Zoning Adjustment Home Rule Act
District of Columbia Board of Zoning Adjustment Home Rule Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
